en:
Use the left mouse button to interact with the environment around you and use your items.

Click on the "i" to open the instructions and the "x" to close them.
Click on the "floors" button to view the floors and return to normal view.

Red dots indicate something needs to be cleaned. Green dots indicate it has been cleaned.
Floors are the exception. They will appear later in the game once you have cleaned a good portion of the room.

Your goal is to clean the entire room using the proper chemicals.
You gain points for proper cleaning and sanitization and you will receive a score at the end.

BE CAREFUL: Improper combinations of chemicals and bacteria will deduct points.
Missing areas also deducts these points.

TIP: You can combine items!

Really test your skills and make the bacteria invisible!

Just click on the button below to increase the difficulty.
Click a room image to start the game!
